title: Rise up with SKT T1 championship skins

replies.body: I can't find the SKT T1 ward in the shop? And is it really 1rp?
It is included in the bundle and that is why it says 1rp the ward skin itself would be the usual price of 640 rp
i cant find it too, rito trolling us
yo when are these on sale? im keen for the kalista one
sales should be on now! if you go in store under skins and Champions they should be the sale prices.

shot boss! 
thought they would be featured ^.^;
Good call I will see what we can do to get them in there!
is the SKT ward on sale yet? Is it only in the bundle?
I think its only in the bundle atm
You can find the story behind the recalls for these skins [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TWc_TFWq91g), in case anyone wants to know why they're so unique XD
when is the SKT T1 Ward skin will be available in the store for purchase?
Cant log into my account send help{{champion:157}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3087}}
